meanings: Noun 달리기, 뛰기, 달리는 시간[거리] (→fun run)
Noun 배달, 운행, 운항 (→milk run, rat run, school run)

vlive.korean: "요새 러닝머신만 30분씩 뛰는데 더 좋은 운동 방법 없을까요?" "I run on a treadmill for 30 minutes. Is there any better way to work out?" 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: "I run on a treadmill for 30 minutes. Is there any better way to work out?"

vlive.english: Home Run Ball! Home Run Ball!

examples.korean: His muscles tensed as he got ready to run. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 달릴 준비를 하자 근육이 긴장되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His muscles tensed as he got ready to run. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Let me know if you run into any snags. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무슨 문제가 있으시면 제게 알려 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me know if you run into any snags. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was trampled to death by a runaway horse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 마구 날뛰는 말에 밟혀 죽었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was trampled to death by a runaway horse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A runaway car came hurtling towards us. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도주 차량 한 대가 우리를 향해 돌진해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A runaway car came hurtling towards us. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The new railway line will run overground. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 새 철도 노선은 지상으로 달리게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
